lyrics:
29 contributorsno peace lyricsverse 1 sam smith  yebba
i see you in the morning feel your fingers in my hair
sometimes i still pretend youre there
it hits me without warning your reflection walking by
but i know its only in my mind

prechorus yebba  sam smith both
will you show me the piece of my heart ive been missin
wont you give me the part of myself that i cant give back
will you show me the piece of my heart ive been missin
cause id kill for you and darlin you know that

chorus yebba sam smith both
so ill light up a cigarette
ill drink it down til theres nothin left
cause i sure cant get no sleep
and lord knows theres no relief
you held my heart in your fingertips
so now i drown in my bitterness
oh i cant get no sleep
and i sure wont i sure wont find no peace
no peace

verse 2 yebba  sam smith
all that i am askin is for a little clarity
thats all that really matters to me
in and out of focus tears are in my eyes
were burnin down the bridges this time
see sam smith liveget tickets as low as 72you might also likeprechorus yebba  sam smith both
will you show me the piece of my heart ive been missin
oh wont you give me the part of myself that i cant give back
will you show me the piece of my heart ive been missin
cause id kill for you and darlin you know that

chorus yebba  sam smith
so ill light up a cigarette
ill drink it down til theres nothin left
cause i sure cant get no sleep
and lord knows theres no relief
you held my heart in your fingertips
so now i drown in my bitterness
oh i cant get no sleep
and i sure wont i sure wont find

bridge sam smith  yebba
i used to find comfort in your arms
caught up in the wonder of your charms
oh ill cry for you ill cry for you
ill lie for you ill lie for you
but i dont even know you anymore

chorus yebba  sam smith
so ill light up a cigarette
ill drink it down til theres nothin left
cause i sure cant get no sleep
and lord knows theres no relief
you held my heart in your fingertips
so now i drown in my bitterness
oh i cant get no sleep
and i sure wont i sure wont find no peace
outro yebba  both
sure wont find no peace no no
will you give me the piece
will you give me the piece of my heart
will you give me the piece
wont you give me the piece of my heart8embed
